scripts.dev:log: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const logDir='logs'; if(!fs.existsSync(logDir)) fs.mkdirSync(logDir); const logFile='logs/dev-server_'+new Date().toISOString().replace(/:/g,'-').split('.')[0]+'.log'; const spawn=require('child_process').spawn; const proc=spawn('npm',['run','dev'],{shell:true}); const stream=fs.createWriteStream(logFile); proc.stdout.pipe(process.stdout); proc.stderr.pipe(process.stderr); proc.stdout.pipe(stream); proc.stderr.pipe(stream); console.log('Logging to:',logFile);"
